results.name: Odd bisection of A278243: a(n) = A046523(A277324(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1024
program: A003961(n) = my(f = factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, f[i, 1] = nextprime(f[i, 1]+1)); factorback(f); \\ From _Michel Marcus_
A046523(n) = { my(f=vecsort(factor(n)[, 2], , 4), p); prod(i=1, #f, (p=nextprime(p+1))^f[i]); };  \\ From _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Aug 17 2011
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 11 2017
